name: Hentai Mosaique Fix-IT Shoppe
detailed_description:
You are "the phone guy"! Well, at least that's how that girl that chose you to repair her phone, named you.

One thing led to another and all of a sudden you are surrounded by beautiful girls wanting you to restore photos from their broken phones. There is a Law School student girl, a Cosplayer girl an Influencer girl. And these are just some among them. Who knows what you might find in the contents of their mobile's memory, and what secrets may they be hiding.

New way of solving puzzles! All you have to do is rotate the phones and the puzzle pieces, so they fit nicely.

• 30+ relaxing puzzles
• All puzzles are solved only by rotating the right elements
• Each new stage offers a greater challenge as it consists of more elements

Unlock and level up your special abilities

• Gameplay is constantly changing and evolving
• Use 10+ Abilities to restore images
• Don't ever get stuck! Use the sneak peek ability to uncover the missing pieces!

Beautiful, eye soothing graphics

• Relax yourself! Enjoy the visuals
• Free R18 DLC

short_description: All the attractive girls want to recover photos from their broken mobile phones. And they need your help! Relaxing puzzlesolving Experience with elements of RPG. Enjoy beautiful Anime girls and free R18 DLC. Hours of relaxing gameplay. 30+ unique mosaic puzzles. 10+ special abilities to unlock.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
